archimate:Product.name: Tulip
archimate:Product.documentation: Tulip: an information visualization framework dedicated to the analysis and visualization of relational data. Written in C++ the framework enables the development of algorithms, visual encodings, interaction techniques, data models, and domain-specific visualizations. at https://tulip.labri.fr/TulipDrupal/?q=node/2155 Run on Mac. Develop by CNRS
